thread.title: Very nice hotel and excellent service.
thread.title_full: Very nice hotel and excellent service. - Review of Hampton Inn San Francisco-Airport, South San Francisco, CA - TripAdvisor

author: Carlo F
title: Very nice hotel and excellent service.
text: Rooms were spacious and very clean. Complimentary breakfast was good. Hotel staff were friendly and accommodating. Online check in was excellent and you get to choose which room you want. Location was great, very close to downtown san francisco. Definitely my family will be back.
